forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. Southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As evening descends on Downtown San Francisco, the sky stretches wide and clear, its deep blue tinged with the last whispers of daylight. With a gentle breeze softly circulating through the streets, temperatures whisper around a mild 46 degrees, inviting a sense of calm. A serene clarity envelops the city, unmarred by fog or the notorious marine layer, allowing the graceful structures of the skyline to stand proudly against the horizon. 

Tomorrow promises a sunlit embrace, reaching for the low sixties before yielding to a cooler afternoon. The day will be ushered in by mellow winds, encouraging a leisurely stroll through the Presidio or a casual café rendezvous in the Mission District. As the sun dips lower, those venturing outside might consider layers—perhaps a light sweater or a stylish jacket—to accommodate the lingering chill. With the pleasant weather beckoning, it’s a fine chance to explore the hidden corners of this vibrant city, perhaps unwinding with a good book in one of the many parks or delighting in the local culinary offerings at an outdoor eatery.
